title: They lied to you... The truth unveiled
body:
This is whats really going on... Dont let 

http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-xF9mk5f_H-s/Vn8ZFo4HZrI/AAAAAAAA2Us/KD60CMELA_w/s1600/Zed.gif  .... fool you

replies.body: {{champion:238}} The unseen props are the deadliest.

{{champion:238}} : Are you sure you take my good side?
Shadow 1 : Of course i did, i am one of your shadows
Shadow 2 : Do you really think this going to do a lot of hype?
{{champion:238}} : Of course this going to generate hype! i mean, i already seeing the post of the people "Zed is dead?" "New champ or rework?"

plot twist

Draven. Because when he says "say my name" he'll get nothing back.

You're a terrible person

XD

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

But really, blame Draven. Or maybe Draven's hubris. It's big enough to have its own persona.

Or *his* own persona?

Imagine Draven, fighting shadows, holding an evoker to his head...

"Welcome... to the League of Draven!" he says, shooting the evoker and summoning Draven, the Executioner to cast—
Deadeye's team is dead, zed through the eye, sona through the throat, how do Garen and Vi die?
Garen bleeds crystal
Vi bleeds fire
I'll take one for the team and do extensive research on this subject.
Oh also, by speculation Garen may be shot through the heart...
and thanks for researching too :D
Vi dies after Garen
YESSSS
Garen is the next to die
Garen is the next to die

"_Looking good boss._"
Someone get us a gif of the Captain Kyoraku petals introduction from Season 2. Bleach fans, you know what I'm talking about...
Shen rework? or New champ? They won't ever give us this icon cause Tenecent's gonna make us pay 13000 RP.

Deadeye is coming. Jhin is coming. first Zed, now Sona, next Garen, then Vi. 3, 4, 5, 6, Deadeye (7). Mid, support, top, jungle, deadeye is adc. Ionia, Demacia/Ionia, Demacia, Piltover. All of these wanted something, and they gave something else for it. Now Deadeye is killing them. The thunder in the background, is a gun. Be warned, Deadeye, Jhin, is coming to the rift.
I've done the math, check it if you think I am wrong, if not, be warned...
Dang, I want to play this game again now... But really, I dont care if you don't think this is happening, dont get mad at me, wait and see that I am right.
